attributes.action: Make baby formula companies list the risks of formula feeding on their tins, and more education on the benefits of breastfeeding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition has come about by the lack of knowledge of the risks of formula feeding babies.  we call upon the government to insist that formula compaines to list the risk of Formula feeding your baby. We also want TV adverts to stop false selling with comments such as "Just like Breastmilk", this is false advertising 

We also call upon the government to put more funding into promoting and the education of Breastfeeding.  We want to see advertisments promoting breastfeeding like we see on the TV for formula.
